screen_desc: The screenshot displays a shopping page on a smartphone with two LG UltraGear monitors. The top monitor is priced at $299.99 and is a 32" Class QHD Gaming Monitor. The bottom monitor is priced at $999.99 after a $600 off discount and is a 38" Class WQHD IPS Curved Gaming Monitor. There are options to adjust the quantity and an "Add" button for each monitor.
action_think: The user has added an LG UltraGear monitor to the shopping cart on Costco. Next, I should proceed to select the checkout option.
action_plan: Select the checkout option on Costco
action_desc: click on the shopping cart icon located at the top right.
action_result: By scrolling down, the user can view more products available on Costco. This action supports the user's request to add more items to the shopping cart, which is a necessary step before proceeding to checkout.
